Reviews.Title: Love this phone battery lasts a lot, it is a bit slow though
Reviews.Author: Claudio Crespo
Reviews.Content: you shouldn't be looking for phone reviews on a purchase page, that's something that you should do on a specialized site like gsm arena and then come back to amazon an buy it because there is too many variables to mention on random reviews.That being said the phone battery last forever, be camera an screen quality are awesome, and the phone only have 512 of ram which makes it slow when many things opened not really good for multitasking, but that was expected, I have an android tablet for my power needs.is the best phone out there if you are looking for small size good battery and overall good performance as it can do all that other android phones do, just that it wont be as fast and you may find yourself with a few windows opening at the same time if you are not patient and keep tapping on an app to open.

Reviews.Title: This is the phone I dreamed of
Reviews.Author: pj
Reviews.Content: Perfection. If I could design a....  SMART.... PHONE this is it. Its a cell phone...remember them? And its smart:Android 4.0 upgrade, on line from Sony website. Unmatched picture quality. The only difference between this phone and the newest and greatest phones on the market is "screen size". If I want computer to go, I will buy a tablet. While manufacturer decided to go bigger and bigger to push sales,  the next place is the wrist watch phone. This is the size of original cell phones that fit in your pocket. Does everything Samsung and Iphone does, just "smart" size and low price and beyond compare display. Add the 'eForCity TPU Rubber Skin Case Compatible with Sony Ericsson Xperia Ray, Black S Shape' for $1.63 and enjoy everything needed for phone and smarts.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous looking phone
Reviews.Author: purplep
Reviews.Content: I have been using this phone for half year. I am writing this review because I really like it.Performance: CPU is only ARMv7 1Ghz single core. RAM is 512MB, 340MB available. Internal memory 1GB, only 420MB available.  but it allows you to install 32GB Mircro SD card. It responds very slow if you open up many applications simultaneously. I would say the performance is in the 50-60 percentile as in 2012. But for a cell phone, I am more concerned with the specs listed below.Screen: 3.3 inch Reality Display with BRAVIA Engine makes the screen super clear. The design is very slim and light weight(100g). The touch screen is very accurate. There is also a protective mineral glass so no need to stick another layer of plastic screen film.Camera: 8 Megapixel, 720p recording. plus the super clear screen (297ppi), picture quality is better than the iphone 4s.Battery life: last about 24 hours, so I just charge it every night. Take about 4 hours to charge completely.Reception and clarity are fairly good.Feature: Walkman music player. Not only that sound quality is superb, but also the music playlist plays immediately when my phone connects to the bluetooth stereo of my car. I can switch songs with buttons on my steering wheel.Flashlight: it's located on the back and I can turn it on with one press.For the price, a couple hundred dollar cheaper than comparable iphone4, it is the good things comes in a small package.
